articles.description: Xiaomi is gearing up to release the MIUI 12.5 update for Mi, Redmi, and Poco smartphones and you can check out all the details here.
articles.content:
New updates are being added at the bottom of this story.
Original story (published on December 13, 2020) follows:
Xiaomi’s MIUI skin is easily one of the most feature-rich skins for Android phones.… [+10618 chars]
